item.title: Just a little pickmeup
item.description: Wow I can’t believe these never made the top 40! IBM One Hundred Percent Club IBM anthem March On With IBM IBM rally song Inspired by Ben Rockwoods comment today about the IBM Songbook

item.title: Parable (a short allegorical story designed to illustrate or teach some truth, religious principle, or moral lesson)
item.description: Rarely do I get emails that are worthy of even reading let alone sharing with others. This one however, is pretty funny, and seems to be fairly accurate.
